entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 10:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
